class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.LabService
class.query: select rl, sr.rate from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.LabService s join s.serviceRates sr join sr.rateList rl where s.id = :serviceId order by rl.startDate desc
class.sql-query: select s.identifier as serviceId, s.code as serviceCode, count(spmn.identifier) as specimens from os_lab_services s inner join os_specimen_lab_services ss on ss.service_id = s.identifier inner join catissue_specimen spmn on spmn.identifier = ss.specimen_id where spmn.activity_status != 'Disabled' and s.identifier in (:serviceIds) group by s.identifier

select sr.service_id as service_id, count(sr.rate_list_id) as rate_lists_count from os_lab_service_rates sr inner join os_lab_services_rate_lists rl on rl.identifier = sr.rate_list_id where rl.activity_status != 'Disabled' and sr.service_id in (:serviceIds) group by sr.service_id
